lead_paragraph: After a berating by President Trump, a correspondent from Ami Magazine, an Orthodox Jewish weekly, said, “Regretfully, today was a day I wish we could have done over.”
snippet: After a berating by President Trump, a correspondent from Ami Magazine, an Orthodox Jewish weekly, said, “Regretfully, today was a day I wish we could have done over.”...

headline.main: A Jewish Reporter Got to Ask Trump a Question. It Didn’t Go Well.
headline.print_headline: He Got Trump’s Attention, but It Didn’t Go Very Well
